title: Maximizing Science Education Effectiveness Using MOOC-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment where students pre-learn MOOC materials on personal devices, then conduct team-based projects and active learning activities in face-to-face classes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze application cases of scientific theories with over 80% accuracy using MOOC content.
Learners can complete projects reflecting peer feedback at least three times through flipped learning strategies in face-to-face classes.

Learners can perform collaboration skills (decision-making, role distribution) required to solve scientific problems at 4 points or above (on a 5-point scale) according to evaluation rubrics through active learning activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
